bookSourceGroup: 🔭 其他,🎊 常用,🎨 漫画
exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style: {\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  榜　　单  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
rank = [
    '总榜',
    '月榜',
    '周榜',
    '日榜',
    '最近更新',
    '新书发布',
    '推荐漫画'
];
orderby = [
    '/ranking/all',
    '/ranking/monthly',
    '/ranking/weekly',
    '/ranking/daily',
    '/update',
    '/update/newbook',
    '/update/recommend'
];
for (i in rank) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}${orderby[i]}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(rank[i], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
kind = [
    '正妹','恋爱','出版','肉欲','浪漫','大尺度','巨乳',
    '有夫之妇','女大生','狗血剧','同居','好友','调教','动作','后宫',
    '不伦','3D','校园','耽美','日漫'
];
link = [
    '正妹','恋爱','出版漫画','肉慾','浪漫','大尺度','巨乳',
    '有夫之婦','女大生','狗血劇','同居','好友','調教','动作','後宮',
    '不倫','3D','校園','耽美','日漫'
];
for (j in kind) {
    Ob = `{{get('ob',Get('p'))}}`;
    St = `{{get('st',Get('q'))}}`;
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/comics/${link[j]}/ob/${Ob}/st/${St}/page/{{page}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[j], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;
</js>
header:
<js>
var Proxy = Map('代理：').split(",");
headers={
    "User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/55.0.2883.87 UBrowser/6.2.4094.1 Safari/537.36",
    "proxy": Proxy.some(value => parseInt(value, 10) == parseInt(Get('ci0'), 10)) ? '' : Proxy[0],
}
cache.put(Get('url') + "headers",JSON.stringify(headers));
JSON.stringify(headers);
</js>
loginUi:
[
  { name: "激活码：", type: "text" },
  { name: "代理：", type: "text" },
  /*{
    name: "                  设置填写的序号为当前源站序号                  ",
    type: "button",
    action: "$()"
  },
  { name: "序号：", type: "text" },*/
  {
    name: "            💡　　 源　　 站　　 更　　 新　　 💡            ",
    type: "button",
    action: "update()"
  },
  { name: "  查看当前  ", type: "button", action: "look(0)" },
  { name: "   查看历史   ", type: "button", action: "look(1)" },
  { name: "  恢复默认  ", type: "button", action: "test(0)" },
  { name: "  繁体搜索  ", type: "button", action: "search_TC()" },
  { name: "   简繁转换   ", type: "button", action: "TC_to_SC()" },
  { name: "  目录整理  ", type: "button", action: "settle()" },

  { name: "                      ༺ˇ»`ʚ  点击切换源站  ɞ´«ˇ༻                     ", type: "button" },
  { name: "      ① 鸟鸟韩漫 ✈️      ", type: "button", action: "$(1)" },
  { name: "      ② 鸟鸟韩漫 🐰      ", type: "button", action: "$(2)" },
  { name: "      ③ 鸟鸟韩漫 🐰      ", type: "button", action: "$(3)" },
  { name: "      ④ 鸟鸟韩漫 🐰      ", type: "button", action: "$(4)" },
  { name: "      ⑤ 鸟鸟韩漫 🐰      ", type: "button", action: "$(5)" },
  { name: "      ⑥ 鸟鸟韩漫 🐰      ", type: "button", action: "$(6)" },

  { name: "                      ༺ˇ»`ʚ  点击切换进度  ɞ´«ˇ༻                    ", type: "button" },
  { name: "      全部      ", type: "button", action: "q(0)" },
  { name: "       连载       ", type: "button", action: "q(1)" },
  { name: "      完结      ", type: "button", action: "q(2)" },

  { name: "                      ༺ˇ»`ʚ  点击切换排序  ɞ´«ˇ༻                    ", type: "button" },
  { name: "            热门人气            ", type: "button", action: "p(0)" },
  { name: "            更新时间            ", type: "button", action: "p(1)" },

  {
    name: "            💡　　 源　　 站　　 打　　 印　　 💡            ",
    type: "button",
    action: "test()"
  }
]

ruleBookInfo.author: author
ruleBookInfo.init:
var Headers = JSON.parse(cache.get(Get('url') + "headers").replace(Get('url'), baseUrl)); var Option = { "method": "GET", "headers": Headers }; if (String(book['author']) !== "xiaohan231") { var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result); var $2 = element => String(java.getElements(element).text()); var $3 = element => String(J.select(element).attr('src')); url = Get('url') + baseUrl.match(/\/comic.*/); s = ''; k = $2('.date').replace(/[已中]/g, '').replace(/\s+.*/, '') + ',' + $2('.txtItme.1').replace(/\s/g, ','); t = $2('.date').replace(/^[^\s]*\s+/, '').replace(/ /, '').replace(/(\d{2})\/(\d{2})\/(\d{4})/, "$3-$1-$2"); t = (t[2] === '-' ?String(java.timeFormat(book.lastCheckTime)).replace(/(\d{4})\/\d{2}\/\d{2} \d{2}:\d{2}/, "$1-") : '') + t; l = $2('.Drama.autoHeight li.0'); l = String(l); l = Get('settle') == true ? l.replace(/\s-\s|-/g, ' ').replace(/\s+/, ' ').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期](|\s)第.*?[话話章回期]/, '$1').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期][^\s]/, '$1 ').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期]\s\d+/, '$1').replace(/.*第.*(\d+).*?[话話章回期]/, '$1').replace(/(\d+)/, l.match(/\d+/) ? l.match(/(\d+)/)[1].padStart(3, '0') : '$1') : l; num = "⓪①②③④⑤⑥⑦⑧⑨⑩⑪⑫⑬⑭⑮⑯⑰⑱⑲⑳" y = ['全部','连载','完结']; z = ['热门人气','更新时间']; Setting = '\n📌当前源站：' + (Get('ci0') == 0 ? '〖默认〗' : '〖自选〗') + num[Get('ci0')] + (Get('url').length > 25 ? Get('url').substring(0, 25) + "
" + Get('url').substring(25) : Get('url')) + ('\n⏲️漫画进度：〖' + (Get('q') == 0 ? '默认' : '自选') + '〗' + y[Get('q')]) + ('\n📚漫画排序：〖' + (Get('p') == 0 ? '默认' : '自选') + '〗' + z[Get('p')]) + ('\n🔍繁体搜索：' + (Get('search_TC') == true ? '〖自选〗开启' : '〖默认〗关闭')) + ('\n📑简繁转换：' + (Get('TC_to_SC') == true ? '〖默认〗开启' : '〖自选〗关闭')) + ('\n🗃目录整理：' + (Get('settle') == true ? '〖自选〗开启' : '〖默认〗关闭')); changeLog = '\nㅤ\nㅤ\n' + Setting + '\nㅤ\n'; book = JSON.stringify({ 'name': $2('.sub_r h1').replace(/[《》]/g, ''), 'author': $2('.txtItme.0').replace(/[,&|]|[图文][:：]/g, '/').replace(/\/\/\/|\/\//g, '/').replace(/^[\/]/g, '').replace(/\|\//g, '').replace(/\s\/\s/g, '/'), 'kind': s + ',' + k, 'word': '', 'latest': l + '〔' + t + '〕', 'intro': (t != '' ? ('更新时间：' + t + '\nㅤ\n') : '') + $2('.txtDesc.autoHeight').replace(/(^)/g, '$1
') + changeLog, 'cover': $3('.pic img') + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option), 'url': url, 'durl': '', 'reName': true }); } else { book = JSON.stringify({ 'kind': book['kind'] }); } Put(book);

var User = '';
var Title = '';
var Link = '';
user_Check();
var data = [];
var Headers = JSON.parse(cache.get(Get('url') + "headers").replace(Get('url'), baseUrl));
var Option = {
    "method": "GET",
    "headers": Headers
};
if (User == true) {
    var list = java.getElements('.itemBox');
    var list1 = java.getElements('.col_3_1 li');
    var length = list[0] ? list.length : list1.length;
    for (i = 0; i < length; i++) {
        if (list[0]) {
            name = list[i].select('.title').text();
            kind = list[i].select('.pd').text();
            latest = list[i].select('.txtItme')[0].text() + '〔' + list[i].select('.date').text() + '〕';
            cover = list[i].select('.itemImg img').attr('src');
            url = Get('url') + list[i].select('.title').attr('href');
        } else {
            name = list1[i].select('.txtA').text();
            kind = '';
            latest = '〔' + list1[i].select('.info').text() + '〕';
            cover = list1[i].select('.ImgA img').attr('src');
            url = Get('url') + list1[i].select('.ImgA').attr('href');
        }
        data.push({
            'name': name,
            'author': '',
            'kind': kind,
            'word': '',
            'latest': latest,
            'intro': '',
            'cover': cover + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option),
            'url': url
        });
    }
    if (list[0]) {
        Data();
    } else {
        var next = java.ajax(baseUrl.replace(/page\/(\d+)/, function(match, p1) {return 'page/' + (parseInt(p1) + 1);}) + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option));
        var next_1 = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(next);
        if ((!list[0] && !list1[0]) || !next_1.select('.itemBox, .col_3_1 li')[0]) {
            Data();
        }
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data();
}
Put(data);
</js>

        title = list[i].select('span').text();
        order = title.match(/(\d+)/);
        title = Get('settle') == true ? String(title).replace(/\s-\s|-/g, ' ').replace(/\s+/, ' ').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期](|\s)第.*?[话話章回期]/, '$1').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期][^\s]/, '$1 ').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期]\s\d+/, '$1').replace(/.*第.*(\d+).*?[话話章回期]/, '$1').replace(/(\d+)/, title.match(/\d+/) ? order[1].padStart(3, '0') : '$1') : title;
        data.push({
            'title': i == 0 ? title + '〔' + (date[2] === '-' ?String(java.timeFormat(book.lastCheckTime)).replace(/(\d{4})\/\d{2}\/\d{2} \d{2}:\d{2}/, "$1-") : '') + date + '〕' : title,
            'link': baseUrl.match(/^(https?:\/\/[^\/]+)/i)[0] + list[i].select('a').attr('href')
        });
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data1();
}
Put(data);
</js>

searchUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
(function (e) {
    if (Get('search_TC') == true || e.indexOf('TC') > -1) {
        e = String(java.s2t(e)).replace(/TC/, '');
    }
    return Get('url') + '/catalog.php?key=' + e;
}(key));
</js>
